doc:
Michael Fox (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Fox_(American_actor) 0 Michael Fox (born Myron Melvin Fox, February 27, 1921 – June 1, 1996) was an American character actor who was in numerous movies and television roles. Some of his most famous recurring roles were as various autopsy physicians in Perry Mason, as Coroner George McLeod in Burke's Law, as Amos Fedders in Falcon Crest, and as Saul Feinberg in The Bold and the Beautiful. Michael_Fox ( born Myron_Melvin_Fox , February_27_,_1921 – June_1_,_1996 ) was an_American_character_actor who was in numerous_movies_and_television_roles .
